name: Gunny Bunny
description:
Description:

Gunny Bunny lives in a picture book, where life is good and calm. But alas, a time mage comes and its friends get stopped in time! Your only chance to save them is defeat the time mage that's cursing the tales world, whom is hiding in the last chapter in the book. But be wary and don't lose time, since the world is getting corrupted second after second, and the troops in the mage's hand only get bigger and bigger.

Controls:

 W/space to jump 

A-D to move

left click to shoot
E to enter doors

Code By: @JordiOcon (Twitter)

Art By: @Yukapiruka (Instagram & Twitter)
